channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg says a lot more AI generated content is coming to fill up your Facebook and Instagram feeds
item.description: First we had friends in our social media feeds, then we had influencers. The next natural phase of the evolution is a feed full of AI-created content,...

item.title: North Korea, in the Spotlight Over Ukraine, Launches a Long-Range Missile
item.description: The launch, into waters west of Japan, came shortly after the United States and South Korea criticized the North for sending troops to join Russia’s w...

item.title: House Covid Panel Refers Andrew Cuomo for Potential Prosecution
item.description: The Republican-led House subcommittee asked the Justice Department to investigate Mr. Cuomo for possible prosecution for “false statements” in his tes...

item.title: 8 Supreme Court Justices in Mexico to Resign Ahead of Contentious Election
item.description: All but three of the country’s Supreme Court justices announced they would quit rather than partake in the controversial elections mandated by a judic...

item.title: Martha Stewart hates the Netflix movie about her
item.description: The iconic TV personality criticizes the documentary “Martha” for spending too much time on her imprisonment

item.title: Typhoon Kong-Rey Takes Aim at Taiwan
item.description: The storm prompted closures and raised the risk of landslides as it approached the island. It was expected to hit as the equivalent of a Category 4 hu...

item.title: North Korea, in the Spotlight Over Ukraine, Launches a Long-Range Missile
item.description: The launch, into waters west of Japan, came shortly after the United States and South Korea criticized the North for sending troops to join Russia’s w...

item.title: Mexico Passes Bill Barring Legal Challenges to Constitutional Changes
item.description: The bill has drawn criticism from legal scholars who say it would bulldoze any judicial oversight of constitutional matters.

item.title: 8 Supreme Court Justices in Mexico to Resign Ahead of Contentious Election
item.description: All but three of the country’s Supreme Court justices announced they would quit rather than partake in the controversial elections mandated by a judic...

item.title: Gen Z and young millennial employees are missing the equivalent of one day’s work every week due to mental health concerns, research shows
item.description: That's costing the British economy a staggering $176 billion.

item.title: Flash Floods in Spain Kill Dozens: What to Know
item.description: Dozens of people were killed after the downpour, which some residents said was the worst they had ever witnessed.

item.title: Microsoft and Alphabet’s latest earnings show once again that it’s all about the cloud
item.description: Microsoft's cloud helped to lift its fiscal first-quarter results after Google's parent reported similarly strong cloud growth a day earlier.

item.title: Mexico Passes Bill Barring Legal Challenges to Constitutional Changes
item.description: The bill has drawn criticism from legal scholars who say it would bulldoze any judicial oversight of constitutional matters.

item.title: Taiwan Braces for Powerful Typhoon Kong-rey
item.description: The approaching storm was forecast to hit as the equivalent of a Category 3 hurricane along Taiwan’s eastern coast on Thursday.

item.title: Microsoft beats Wall Street expectations with big help from its cloud business, but warns of slower growth in second quarter
item.description: CEO Satya Nadella attributed the faster-than-expected growth to artificial intelligence transforming the workplace.
